About me

When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

Hi, I’m Sukeesh.

I am a budding Software Developer and Metallurgy undergrad at IIT Roorkee.

I have a keen interest in solving real life problems with For loops.

I’m interested in Competitive Programming, Artificial Intelligence, Information Retrieval and everything else including Pizzas.

Whenever I’m not hitting my system’s keypad, I can be found doing anything. For example, travelling through the vast repository of repositories in Github or clicking random stuffs around me or browsing Quora.

I maintain a post on my setup at /setup.

I maintain a project list at /projects.

I push most of my code to Github.

I can be stacked on Twitter or Instagram.

You can email me on vsukeeshbabu[at]gmail[dot]com

Tweet Follow @sukeeshbabu
